text: Nyctimantis arapapa is the broad-snout casque-headed tree frog. The frog lives in the rainforest of southern Bahia, Brazil. ==First paper== *Pimenta BVS, Napoli MF, Haddad CFB. 2009 "A new species of casque-headed tree frog, genus Aparasphenodon Miranda-Ribeiro (Amphibia: Anura: Hylidae), from the Atlantic Rainforest of southern Bahia, Brazil." Zootaxa 2123:46-54. ==References== Category:Frogs of South America
title: Nyctimantis arapapa
